name: Brunello di Montalcino Banfi 2019
description:
Description

Premium Brunello with complex notes of cherry, leather, and spice. Aged to perfection with firm tannins and a long, elegant finish.

Language of Wine

Deep ruby to garnet in color. Premium Brunello with complex notes of cherry, leather, and spice. Aged to perfection with firm tannins and a long, elegant finish.

Food Pairing

Classic pairing with pasta with tomato sauce, pizza margherita, or osso buco. Complements grilled meats, wild boar, or aged Pecorino cheese.

name: Sequoia Grove Cabernet Sauvignon Napa Valley 2020
description:
Description

Luxury Napa Cabernet with blackcurrant, cassis, and mocha. Rich, full-bodied with polished tannins and exceptional depth.

Language of Wine

Deep ruby to garnet in color. Luxury Napa Cabernet with blackcurrant, cassis, and mocha. Rich, full-bodied with polished tannins and exceptional depth.

Food Pairing

Ideal with grilled entrecôte, steak frites, or beef bourguignon. Pairs exceptionally well with roasted venison, duck breast with cherry sauce, or wild mushroom risotto. Also excellent with aged Cheddar or Époisses.

name: Cloudy Bay Pinot Noir 2022
description:

Deep ruby to garnet in color. Elegant Pinot Noir with red cherry, wild strawberry, and subtle oak. Silky texture with vibrant acidity and a long finish.

Food Pairing

Excellent with duck confit, salmon, or mushroom risotto. Pairs beautifully with soft cheeses like Brie or Camembert. Also wonderful with roasted chicken or pork tenderloin.
